Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» A former kingpin of the streets, Miles "Cain" Skinner (Ving Rhymes) is doing life in prison. He is feared and respected among the inmates. When Cain learns that his sentance will be shortend only by brain cancer, his urgency to change his ways goes into overdrive. His only desire is save his two feuding sons, also inmates, from each other.

Warden Dean (Robert Patrick) is the only man that can help Cain with the redemption he seeks, but it comes at a price...
